desc: For Dog & Cat owners that want peace of mind around the safety of their Pet. Our custom collars have your pets name embroidered onto a quality spun polyester collar in a range of colour combinations. Allowing whomever finds your pet a way to calm them by name and notify you quickly of their location.

layout.text: Peace of Mind for Pet Owners.
Our premium collars are embroidered with your Pet’s name and your contact details, allowing whoever finds your lost pet the chance to calm them by name and notify you quickly of their location.
